<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anticipate Ambush](/Feats.aspx?ID=1791) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

Using your extensive knowledge of ambush tactics, you keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel speed. If you're Anticipating an Ambush at the start of an encounter, you roll a Perception check for initiative, and all enemies rolling [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) for initiative take a –2 circumstance penalty to their Stealth checks.
name: Anticipate Ambush
